mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Duhan, H. A. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Duhan, H. A.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 27 1861. By Telegraph from Grafton 27 1861. Send me the names Company regiment and cause for those nine men so I can fill up the order& send it down in the mail. H A Duhan Agt Govt Railway 21Gr83pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Duhan, H. A.
Grafton, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
